sentences.sentence: SEO technology is dead, but our cerebra is not dead!
sentences.translation: SEO技术是死的，但是我们的大脑不是死的！

sentences.sentence: Different cerebra patters may have different impact on working quality and state.
sentences.translation: 人的两种大脑模式的差异，对美术的工作性质和状态都有着极大影响。

sentences.sentence: He compares the Chinese and Western cultures to the right and left cerebra of his minds.
sentences.translation: 他与他的头脑的右和左大脑比较中国和西部文化。
